document_data.mainbody:
ouse Masqilyr was a deceased drow house of Menzoberranzan.
House Masqilyr was one of the seven founding families of Menzoberranzan. It fell during the wars with House Nasadra when the city was still young. Some of the priests and priestesses of this survived as ghauropers in an underwater temple beneath Donigarten. They were worshipers of Ghaunadaur.
